t: Belgique is an absolutely amazing brand! They are high quality
s: Belgique is an absolutely amazing brand! They are high quality, stainless steel cookware. These are typically sold exclusively at Macy's Department Store, and are incredibly expensive. So imagine my excitement when I found a set that retails at Macy's for $300 here for $165!
